text: Bryan Konietzko is the co-creator and executive producer of the animated series Avatar: The Last Airbender. He has also worked as a character designer for the animated series Family Guy. He was a storyboard artist and art director for the Nickelodeon animated series Invader Zim. == Other websites == * * * Interview with Mike and Bryan at AvatarSpirit.Net Category:Living people Category:American animators
title: Bryan Konietzko
